Animath.in

Code based Video Creation

2025

Animath transforms your mathematical ideas into stunning visual animations. Simply describe what you want to see, and our AI will generate Python code using Manim to create your animation.Completely scalable with the use of AWS services and Kafka with postgreSQL database.

Next.jsTailwind CSSEC2ECSECRS3CloudFrontExpressSocket.ioKafkaPostgreSQLDockerManimPython

DeployNet.in

Cloud Based Deployment Platform

2025

DeployNet is a modern deployment platform that allows you to deploy both anything from static and dynamic web applications or even a simple script of any language directly cloned from github with zero configuration using AWS services.

Collab-Draw

Collaborative Drawing App

2024

Collab-Draw is a real-time collaborative drawing app that lets you sketch and create with friends on a shared canvas. Built using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Socket.io, it delivers fast, interactive, and seamless drawing sessions.

Next.jsTailwind CSSEC2ExpressSocket.ioPostgreSQLDocker

Crypto Wallet App

Cross Platform Crypto Wallet

2024

A cross platform crypto wallet app that allows you to manage your crypto assets and transactions. It is built with React Native, TypeScript, and Web3.js. It is a simple and easy to use wallet app that allows you to send ,receive and track prices of crypto assets.
